ThermoElectric

ThermoElectric is a linear Boltzmann Transport Solver (BTE) solver that computes electronic transport coefficients in nano-structured materials. ThermoElectric has unique features for designing the nanoscale morphology of thermoelectric materials to enhance electronic performance through electron energy filtering.

Installation

gh repo clone ariahosseini/ThermoElectric
cd ThermoElectric
sudo python setup.py install
